metadata.name: HackTool - Impersonate Execution
metadata.comment: Detects execution of the Impersonate tool. Which can be used to manipulate tokens on a Windows computers remotely (PsExec/WmiExec) or interactively

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('impersonate.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' list ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' exec ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' adduser '))) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('md5=9520714ab576b0ed01d1513691377d01')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('sha256=e81cc96e2118dc4fbfe5bad1604e0ac7681960143e2101e1a024d52264bb0a8a')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('imphash=0a358ffc1697b7a07d0e817ac740df62'))))

output.summary: Detects execution of the Impersonate tool. Which can be used to manipulate tokens on a Windows computers remotely (PsExec/WmiExec) or interactively
